tasks.task: Proper ballasting and tire inflation of a tractor for demo
subtasks: Discussing slip percentage for proper tractor setup (2-4%)
Ensuring proper air pressure on all tires, with a goal of 3 bars on the ground
Adjusting air pressure based on equipment attached to the back of the tractor
Applying ballast weights to the inside of dual tires
Adjusting ballast weights on the front of the tractor
